name: Running with Scissors (existentialtea, AlexisJustDuclaux, alexGauthier)
description:
MADE FOR GLOBAL GAME JAM 2023

Running With Scissors is a local multiplayer game for up to 4 players!

For the best experience, please use Xbox controllers.

 Your hair constantly grows.

 Your objective is to run around with scissors trying to cut the hair of everyone else, all while avoiding the same fate. 

 The closer you are to cutting someone’s hair at the root, the more lengths of hair you earn. The player with the most hair snipped when the timer runs out, wins!

Xbox Controller:

  • Use Left Joystick to move
  • Press A to dash and cut hair
  • On the player join menu, press RB or LB to change the match time

Keyboard:

  • WASD to move
  • Space Bar to dash and cut hair
  • On the player join menu, press Q or E to change the match time
